interpretation:
The "curly hair" emoji represents a free-spirited and creative individual who is unafraid to express themselves. This person values their individuality and embraces their unique qualities. They are often seen as energetic and lively, with a natural charm that draws people towards them. At times, this individual may struggle with conforming to societal norms and may feel misunderstood or out of place. However, their ability to think outside the box and see the world from a different perspective is a valuable gift. 

In a tarot reading, the "curly hair" card can signify a time of self-discovery and embracing one's true self. It may also suggest the need to break free from societal expectations and follow one's own path. This card reminds us to celebrate our differences and appreciate the beauty in our own unique qualities.
